title: Canned Water: A Sustainable Hydration Solution

slides.title: Title: Canned Water - Rethinking Hydration
bullets: Sustainable alternative to plastic bottled water.
Providing purified water in infinitely recyclable aluminum cans.
Addressing the growing consumer demand for eco-friendly products.
Seeking seed funding to scale production and expand market reach.

slides.title: Problem: The Plastic Crisis
bullets: Plastic bottled water contributes significantly to plastic waste.
Plastic pollution harms ecosystems and human health.
Consumers are increasingly aware and seeking alternatives.
Current alternatives often lack convenience or affordability.

slides.title: Solution: Pure Water, Sustainable Package
bullets: Premium purified water in aluminum cans.
Aluminum is infinitely recyclable, reducing environmental impact.
Convenient and portable for on-the-go hydration.
Positioned as a premium, eco-conscious choice.

slides.title: Market: Growing Demand for Sustainability
bullets: Targeting environmentally conscious consumers.
Addressing the expanding market for sustainable beverages.
Opportunity to disrupt the traditional bottled water industry.
Focus on retail, hospitality, and corporate partnerships.

slides.title: Business Model: Scalable and Profitable
bullets: Direct-to-consumer (DTC) online sales.
Strategic partnerships with retailers and distributors.
Subscription model for recurring revenue.
Focus on efficient production and supply chain management.

slides.title: Team: Experienced and Passionate
bullets: Experienced team with expertise in beverage production, marketing, and sustainability.
Proven track record of building and scaling successful businesses.
Dedicated to creating a positive impact on the environment.
Advisory board with industry experts.

slides.title: Ask: Seed Funding for Growth
bullets: Seeking $500,000 in seed funding.
Funds will be used for production scaling, marketing, and team expansion.
